page.title: 04 Farms in our Locality
page.content: The{farms}we surveyed were quite different. { THE CROFT}used to belong to the {Aldenham Park Estate,}before it was sold. Now it has mostly{beef cattle: {Charolais}and{Hereford_Fresian}cross. { DAIRY FARM}grows{sugar beet.}In September the farmer harvests it and sells it to the{factories}in {Kidderminster. {KINGSLEY FARM}has been in the same family for{three generations}and a farm has been on the site for{500 {years.}The farm was part of a hamlet referred to in the first{Domesday {Book.}The farmer owns his own{combine{ {harvester,}as well as{tractors}and {balers. { THE HOOK FARM}is used for{cattle {breeding. Hereford}cattle are bred because they are{adaptable}and good{beef}cattle.
